about_the_game:
In the near future, aliens have decided to enslave the earth.

You are mankind's last hope...

Destroy the alien threat and save our planet!

You will pilot fighter jets equipped with the latest technology.

In this super dynamic survivors-like bullet hell you will have hundreds of weapons, dozens of modifications and hordes of enemies in your arsenal!

Try new combinations, create unique builds, and find secret weapons.

By destroying enemies, you'll get special parts for your aircraft. Thanks to random generation, each part will be unique, allowing you to build your fighter to suit your play style.

Develop, mine better equipment and modifications, advance to new difficulty levels and earn more rare parts!

A huge variety of enemies and bosses, a wide variety of active skills, a day and night change system - every flight you take will be unique.

Well and simply, do PEW PEW and have fun!

In the near future, aliens have decided to enslave the earth.

You are mankind's last hope...

Destroy the alien threat and save our planet!

In this super dynamic survivors-like bullet hell you will have hundreds of weapons, dozens of modifications and hordes of enemies in your arsenal!

By destroying enemies, you'll get special parts for your aircraft. Thanks to random generation, each part will be unique, allowing you to build your fighter to suit your play style.

Develop, mine better equipment and modifications, advance to new difficulty levels and earn more rare parts!

A huge variety of enemies and bosses, a wide variety of active skills, a day and night change system - every flight you take will be unique.

Well and simply, do PEW PEW and have fun!
name: Flying Pew Pew

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600k/ Ryzen 3 1300
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060/ RX 580

short_description: The alien hordes have attacked us for no reason. We must throw all our forces to repel our planet from the alien invaders!
